Source code for Neuroscience.structures.Inhibitory_Neuron

import os
import sys

project_root = os.path.abspath(os.path.join(os.path.dirname(__file__), '../../'))
sys.path.append(project_root)

from Neuroscience.structures.Abstract_Neuron import Abstract_Neuron

# Definition of class Inhibitory_Neuron, inherits from AbstractNeuron

[docs]class Inhibitory_Neuron(Abstract_Neuron):


[docs]    def set_axon_terminals(self):
        # Turn all axon terminals on
        for i in range(self.num_axon_terminals):
            self.axon_terminals[i][1] = -1



[docs]    def propagate_outputs(self):
        # Update inputs from connected neurons
        for item in self.axon_terminals:
            if self.max_active_potential:
                item[0].inputs[item[1]] = -1
            else:
                item[0].inputs[item[1]] = 0



[docs]    def print(self):
        print("Inhibitory Neuron")
        print("dendrites : ",self.num_dendrites)
        print("axon terminals : ", self.num_axon_terminals)


    def __init__(self, res, inputs, outputs, instance_count = ""):
        super().__init__(res, inputs, outputs, instance_count= instance_count)# calls the constructor of AbstractNeuron class (prevents duplicated code)
        self.type = "Inhibitory"  
        self.name = "Inhibitory_Neuron"
